General.Name: AB Utenos Trikotazas
General.Description: Utenos Trikotazas AB, together with its subsidiaries, produces and sells knitwear and textile articles under the UTENOS and ABOUT brands. The company operates through two segments, Production of Knitted Articles and Production of Working Clothes. It offers jersey fabrics, which include base layer, mid layer, workwear fabric, and fabric for service uniform; fabric development services, such as knitting, finishing, natural dyes, dyeing, and printing; and ready-made garments comprising leisurewear, underwear, fashion, kids and baby clothing, functional clothing, sportswear, sleepwear, thermal clothing, home textile, and on-demand production clothing. The company also exports its products to Germany, Austria, Switzerland, and Scandinavia. It sells its products through physical stores, as well as e-shops. The company was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Utena, Lithuania. Utenos Trikotazas AB operates as a subsidiary of UAB koncernas SBA.
